name: Khans of Tarkir Mega-Pack
description: A very large package capturing the feel and mechanics of Khans of Tarkir: Outlast (Abzan), Prowess (Jeskai), Delve (Sultai), Raid (Mardu), Ferocious (Temur), and Morph. Includes clan-flavored effects, wedge synergies, tri-lands, banners, and modal charms. Designed for a huge set.

Creature: {ATTACK_INTRO} if you attacked with a creature this turn, {RAID_BONUS}.
{STATIC_INTRO} creatures you control get +1/+0 if you control a creature with power {FEROCIOUS_POWER} or greater.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, {COUNTER_SYNERGY}.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} whenever you gain life, tap target creature an opponent controls.
Instant: Target creature gets +{SMALL_N}/+{SMALL_N} until end of turn. If you attacked with a creature this turn, it gains first strike until end of turn. ({RAID_LABEL})
Exile target tapped creature.
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If you control a creature with power {FEROCIOUS_POWER} or greater, those creatures also gain lifelink until end of turn. ({FEROCIOUS_LABEL})
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {SMALL_X}. If you control a Monk, scry 1.
Tap up to two target creatures. You gain {SMALL_N} life.
Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.
Sorcery: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to {TOK_COUNT} target creatures you control. Creatures with counters you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
Exile target creature with power {FEROCIOUS_POWER} or greater.
Return target creature card with mana value {MV_OR_LESS} or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
Enchantment: Creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them have vigilance and lifelink.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you attacked with a creature last turn, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token. ({RAID_LABEL})
Whenever a face-down creature you control is turned face up, you gain {SMALL_N} life and scry 1.
AuraCreature: Enchanted creature gets +{SMALL_N}/+{SMALL_N} and has vigilance.
Enchanted creature has '{ACTIVATED_COST}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.'
Artifact: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you gain 1 life. ({JESKAI_HINT})
{ACTIVATED_COST}, {TAP}, sacrifice {SELF_NAME}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Whenever equipped creature attacks, if you attacked with a creature this turn, tap target creature defending player controls. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Land: {TAP}, pay 1 life, sacrifice {SELF_NAME}: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Creature: {TRIGGER_INTRO} whenever you cast a noncreature spell, {JESKAI_PAYOFF}.
{STATIC_INTRO} face-down creatures you control have hexproof.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} whenever you mill one or more cards, scry 1.
Instant: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {SMALL_X}. Delve. ({DELVE_REMINDER})
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If you control a creature with power {FEROCIOUS_POWER} or greater, draw a card. ({FEROCIOUS_LABEL})
Draw two cards. If you attacked with a creature this turn, scry 2. ({RAID_LABEL})
Target creature gets -{SMALL_N}/0 until end of turn. If it has power {FEROCIOUS_POWER} or greater, draw a card.
Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step if you cast a noncreature spell this turn.
Sorcery: Create a token that's a copy of target face-down creature you control.
Enchantment: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, scry 1, then target creature can't be blocked this turn.
Face-down creatures you control get +0/+2 and have hexproof as long as they are face down.
AuraCreature: Enchanted creature has prowess and 'Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.'
Artifact: Whenever you exile one or more cards from your graveyard, draw a card, then discard a card.
{TAP}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast noncreature spells.
Equipment: Equipped creature has 'Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.' Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Land: {TAP}, pay 1 life, sacrifice {SELF_NAME}: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Creature: {TRIGGER_INTRO} whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Instant: Target creature gets -{SMALL_N}/-{SMALL_N} until end of turn. If you attacked with a creature this turn, that creature also loses indestructible until end of turn. ({RAID_LABEL})
Destroy target creature with mana value {MV_OR_LESS} or less. Delve. ({DELVE_REMINDER})
Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.
Each opponent loses {SMALL_N} life. You gain that much life.
Sorcery: Target opponent discards two cards. Delve. ({DELVE_REMINDER})
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its mana value.
Destroy target tapped creature. You gain {SMALL_N} life.
Enchantment: At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
Whenever you exile one or more cards from your graveyard, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Equipment: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has deathtouch. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Land: {TAP}, pay 1 life, sacrifice {SELF_NAME}: Search your library for a Swamp or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

{TRIGGER_INTRO} whenever you cast a noncreature spell, target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
Instant: {SMALL_N} damage to any target. If you attacked with a creature this turn, {RAID_BURN_BONUS}. ({RAID_LABEL})
Target creature can't block this turn. If you control a creature with power {FEROCIOUS_POWER} or greater, draw a card. ({FEROCIOUS_LABEL})
Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. If you cast a noncreature spell this turn, untap those creatures.
Sorcery: {SMALL_N} damage divided as you choose among up to {TOK_COUNT} targets.
Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
Enchantment: Whenever you attack with one or more creatures, create a tapped Treasure token.
Creatures you control have 'Raid — This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.'
AuraCreature: Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has haste.
Artifact: Whenever you attack with a creature, you may sacrifice {SELF_NAME}. If you do, {SMALL_N} damage to any target.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +2/+0. Whenever equipped creature attacks, create a tapped Treasure token. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Land: {TAP}, pay 1 life, sacrifice {SELF_NAME}: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Creature: {TRIGGER_INTRO} whenever one or more cards are exiled from your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} whenever a noncreature spell is cast, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Instant: Target creature you control fights up to one target creature you don't control. If you control a creature with power {FEROCIOUS_POWER} or greater, that creature gains indestructible until end of turn. ({FEROCIOUS_LABEL})
Put a +1/+1 counter on up to two target creatures. Those creatures gain trample until end of turn.
Add {G}{G}. If you attacked with a creature this turn, add {G}{G} again. ({RAID_LABEL})
Sorcery: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Delve. ({DELVE_REMINDER})
Create a 4/4 green Elemental creature token. If you control a creature with power {FEROCIOUS_POWER} or greater, create two of those tokens instead. ({FEROCIOUS_LABEL})
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Enchantment: Creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as you control a creature with power {FEROCIOUS_POWER} or greater.
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
AuraCreature: Enchanted creature gets +{SMALL_N}/+{SMALL_N} and has trample.

Artifact: {TAP}, exile a card from your graveyard: Add one mana of any color.
Land: {TAP}, pay 1 life, sacrifice {SELF_NAME}: Search your library for a Forest or Island card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Sorcery: Create a 2/2 colorless face-down creature token with 'You may turn this creature face up any time for its morph cost.'
Reveal the top {TOK_COUNT} cards of your library. Put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Delve. ({DELVE_REMINDER})
Enchantment: Whenever you turn a creature you control face up, {TURNUP_GLOBAL}.
Artifact: {TAP}: Add one mana of any of {WEDGE_COLORS}. {BANNER_HINT}

TRIGGER_INTRO: At the beginning of your end step,
ATTACK_INTRO: At the beginning of combat on your turn,
MORPH_REMINDER: You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.
PROWESS_REMINDER: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
DELVE_REMINDER: Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.
OUTLAST_REMINDER: {OUTLAST_TAP} Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
JESKAI_HINT: Jeskai spells care about noncreature spells.
BANNER_HINT: Clan banners help fix wedge colors.
Banner mana can be used for anything.
